(:action brown
      :parameters (?npc - player ?item1 - item ?item2 - item ?tool - item ?location - location) 
      :precondition (and (at ?npc ?location) (inventory ?npc ?item1) (inventory ?npc ?item2) (inventory ?npc ?tool) (is_tool ?tool) (is_location ?location))
      :effect (and (browned ?item1) (browned ?item2))

(:action drain ; Drain an excess substance from an item into a specified location
  :parameters (?npc - entity ?item - object ?location - place)
  :precondition (and (at ?npc ?location) (inventory ?npc ?item) (contains_excess ?item) (is_drain_location ?location))
  :effect (not (contains_excess ?item))

(:action add ; Add an item to a resource and update its status
  :parameters (?npc - person ?resource - object ?item - object) 
  :precondition (and (available ?npc) (contains ?resource ?item) (not (updated ?resource)))
  :effect (and (updated ?resource))

(:action finish
  ; Complete a multi-step task and update the status
  :parameters (?npc - player ?location - location ?item - item ?task - task)
  
  :precondition (and 
    (at ?npc ?location) 
    (inventory ?npc ?item) 
    (task_step ?task ?step) ; Current step of the task
    (valid_step ?step ?task) ; Validity of the current step in the task sequence
  )
  
  :effect (and 
    (not (task_step ?task ?step))
